rss:
[%- page.style = 'none'; USE date; -%]
[% page.title %] - [% title %] http://www.redrockeater.org Red Rock Eater News Service Archive - [% title %] feed en-us Phil Agre Copyright 1993-[% date.format(date.now, "%Y") %] [% date.format(entries.0.unixtime, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S-08:00") %]
daily 1 2000-01-01T12:00+00:00
[%# USE Dumper; %] [%# Dumper.dump(entries) %]
[% FOR e = entries %]
[% e.title %] - [% e.date %] [% e.fqdn_url %] description field [%- IF e.link_id; guid = "l" _ e.link_id; ELSIF e.mail_id; guid = "m" _ e.mail_id; END; %] [% guid %]@redrockeater.org [% e.cdata %] [% IF e.category -%] [% "category" %] [%- END %] [% date.format(e.unixtime, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S-08:00") %]
[% END %]
